parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Isaiah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Hesaias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From hupokrinomai; an actor under an assumed character, i.e. a dissembler
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
This; he, she, it.
Apparently a primary word; a people.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From timios; to prize, i.e. Fix a valuation upon; by implication, to revere.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a form of the same as chasma; a lip; figuratively, a margin.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have in full, be far, it is enough. From apo and echo; to have out, i.e. Receive in full; to keep away, i.e. Be distant.
Far, far off, at a distance. Adverb from pro; forwards, i.e. At a distance.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
